comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/62424671@N03] Thank you for all your comments Kirkleyjohn. We are pleased to see that you are enjoying the photographs from our collection, there are plenty more to come so stay tuned! Currently we have a number of sailing vessels like this on display in our Wharf 7 site.
